title: BLAKE2B precompile throws exception
body:
* py-evm Version: 0.6.1a2
* OS: linux/ubuntu
* Python Version 3.8.10:
* Environment (at end):

### What is wrong?

I am attempting to replicate the mainnet transaction `0x96e0415a617ff9018593333ed759063e99bbe77005251e5d7023ca3e6ee409ac`.
I have stubbed the chaindb to load state directly from a geth instance, as needed.
Unfortunately, I do not have a convenient minimal replication.

This invokes the blake2b precompile, which throws an exception:

```
...
  File "/project/env/lib/python3.8/site-packages/py_evm-0.6.1a2-py3.8.egg/eth/vm/logic/call.py", line 162, in __call__                                                                                                 
    child_computation = computation.apply_child_computation(child_msg)                                                                                                                                                                        
  File "/project/env/lib/python3.8/site-packages/py_evm-0.6.1a2-py3.8.egg/eth/vm/computation.py", line 364, in apply_child_computation                                                                                 
    child_computation = self.generate_child_computation(child_msg)                                                                                                                                                                            
  File "/project/env/lib/python3.8/site-packages/py_evm-0.6.1a2-py3.8.egg/eth/vm/computation.py", line 376, in generate_child_computation                                                                              
    child_computation = self.apply_message(                                                                                                                                                                                                   
  File "/project/env/lib/python3.8/site-packages/py_evm-0.6.1a2-py3.8.egg/eth/vm/forks/frontier/computation.py", line 83, in apply_message                                                                             
    computation = cls.apply_computation(                                                                                                                                                                                                      
  File "/project/env/lib/python3.8/site-packages/py_evm-0.6.1a2-py3.8.egg/eth/vm/computation.py", line 527, in apply_computation                                                                                       
    precompile(computation)                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
  File "/project/env/lib/python3.8/site-packages/py_evm-0.6.1a2-py3.8.egg/eth/precompiles/blake2.py", line 32, in blake2b_fcompress                                                                                    
    computation.output = blake2b_compress(*parameters)                                                                                                                                                                                        
  File "/project/env/lib/python3.8/site-packages/py_evm-0.6.1a2-py3.8.egg/eth/_utils/blake2/compression.py", line 102, in blake2b_compress                                                                             
    m = struct.unpack_from('<16%s' % Blake2b.WORDFMT, bytes(block))                                                                                                                                                                           
ValueError: bytes must be in range(0, 256)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
```


### How can it be fixed

delete [`eth/_utils/blake2/compression.py` line 101](https://github.com/ethereum/py-evm/blob/2e44b8a7c71d1ed67cd3a95320f0612dfb76307d/eth/_utils/blake2/compression.py#L101):

```python
    m = struct.unpack_from('<16%s' % Blake2b.WORDFMT, bytes(block))
```

Explanation: at the above line, `block` is not actually type `bytes` -- it is already parsed into a tuple of `int`s at [`eth/_utils/blake2/coders.py` line 32](https://github.com/ethereum/py-evm/blob/2e44b8a7c71d1ed67cd3a95320f0612dfb76307d/eth/_utils/blake2/coders.py#L32):

```python
    message = cast(TMessage, _get_64_bit_little_endian_words(input_bytes[68:196]))
```

Which is called at [`eth/precompiles/blake2.py:23`](https://github.com/ethereum/py-evm/blob/2e44b8a7c71d1ed67cd3a95320f0612dfb76307d/eth/precompiles/blake2.py#L23)

### Environment

